<class name="AboveBelowStore" extends="DelegatingStore" startLine="31">
* A merger of two {@linkplain MatrixStore} instances by placing one store below the other. The two matrices must have * the same number of columns. The columns of the two matrices are logically merged to form new longer columns. apete
